parsing_result:
# Viewing and Changing Settings

1. **Press `Q`** to display the quick menu during shooting.

   !Quick Menu Button

2. **Use the focus stick (focus lever)** to highlight items and rotate the rear command dial to change.

   !Quick Menu Display

   > ðŸ’¡ **Tip:**  
   > To jump to the !Edit/Save Custom Setting Icon **EDIT/SAVE CUSTOM SETTING** menu, press and hold the `Q` button when the quick menu is displayed.

3. **Press `Q`** to exit when settings are complete.

   > ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
   > - The quick menu can also be edited using touch controls.  
   > - Using !Button/Dial Setting Icon **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > FUNCTION (Fn) SETTING**, you can assign the `Q` button roles normally reserved for the function buttons or assign the `Q` buttonâ€™s default role to a function button (see page 317).  
   > - To disable the `Q` (quick menu) button, select **NONE** for !Button/Dial Setting Icon **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > FUNCTION (Fn) SETTING > Q BUTTON SETTING**.
